thought: To craft a crimson_door, I need to craft two crimson_planks. To craft a crimson_plank, I need to place a crimson_stem in the crafting table. There is a crimson_stem in slot 38, so I will move it to the crafting table in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1
